description:
Wrong order of parameters 
nova-manage network create 10.93.24.0/24 1 64

/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/nova/network/manager.py 
on line 714 req_cidrs = self._validate_cidrs(context, cidr, num_networks, network_size)
gets 64 for the number of networks and 1 for the network size
title: fails command nova-manage network create

comments.content:
Wrong order of parameters 
nova-manage network create 10.93.24.0/24 1 64

/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/nova/network/manager.py 
on line 714 req_cidrs = self._validate_cidrs(context, cidr, num_networks, network_size)
gets 64 for the number of networks and 1 for the network size
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ikrimer

comments.content:
Command parameters have changed recently.
You should put 'label' of the network right before the CIDR.

For example,
nova-manage network create private 10.93.24.0/24 1 64
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hyunsun-moon
